game.name: Snow Hill Racing
game.description:
Racing is a big source of fun and entertainment for many gamers. If you are a big fan of speed games, we have something special for you. It is our pleasure to connect you with a brand new racing challenge where you have to control a red color sports car on the snowy hill environment. Would you like to participate now? Join Snow Fast Hill Track Racing and get ready to win races on the hill to earn some rewards!

Start this cute HTML5 car challenge by going through the practice mode first! Once you get the expertise here, get you ready to complete all the races of the Career mode. There are two modes including Practice and Career modes to play through. When you enter this 3D driving simulator, you have to drive your chosen car at top speed on the snowing track. Remember you are not alone on the tracks so you need to be a bit fast to become a champion hill climber by beating all your opponents.

This racing is going to be conducted on the hills. Make sure to guide your car wisely on the sharp turns to avoid the crash. Your hill climb driving skills will surely help you to stay ahead in the game. Do not forget to check your fuel tank before heading towards the biggest racing challenge of your life. This awesome car racing game features a multilevel game with free rewards, a variety of Hillclimb-like ice climber and bill highway cram, and different fabulous car models to play. Your every successful racing mission will reward you with some coins through which you can also buy new car models.
